ch.usi.inf.lidr.merging
Interface ResultsMerging

All Superinterfaces:
ScoreNormalization
All Known Implementing Classes:
CORI, SAFE, SSL
public interface ResultsMerging
extends ScoreNormalization

An interface for results merging methods. Note that results merging techniques perform score normalization with a help of a centralized sample index (CSI).

Author:
Ilya Markov
See Also:
"Advances in Information Retrieval, chapter 5. Distributed Information Retrieval", Jamie Callan. Kluwer Academic Publishers, pages 127-150, 2000., "Federated Search", Milad Shokouhi and Luo Si. Foundations and Trends in Information Retrieval, pages 1-102, 2011.
